website_summaries.verdict: Multiple display choices and a unique style that is different from other options.
pros: Each storage unit can hold up to 10 pounds
Each cube can be used separately or combined and stacked to make a customization storage unit
Long-lasting materials are made from biodegradable properties
cons: This is best used for lighter items, as it can fall apart easily under heavier weight

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I redecorated my spare bedroom to turn it into a craft room, so I figured I would give these a try. They're way more sturdy than I expected, I was pleasantly surprised. I bought 2 packs + a smaller pack of the same size. I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, easy to assemble, as you can see from the attached photo, we used it to organize my wife's favorite purses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The directions that I received were not very helpful and so I wasted a ton of time trying to figure out how the pieces fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have an online T-shirt store and needed to find a way to keep the shirts I sell very neatly folded and organized. This cube was the perfect size and fit for what I needed. I loved most the sturdy frame and clean design. This looks very nice when put together. I’m very happy with my purchase. I only took one star off for the learning curve. I only received one sheet for instructions and it wasn’t clear at all how to connect all of the parts. I wasted a ton of time trying to figure it out. Once I did, it went fast.
customer_reviews.author: Happy In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great shelves!
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are awesome. My wife and I put them together in less than 15 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Inexpensive Storage for Light Items
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my office to use with storage bins. Assembly was quick and easy, and they seem to be holding up nicely. I only remove one star because my picture frames sag when they are placed on the shelves - not too much, but be aware that the plastic sheets are not solid, but instead made of slightly flexible material.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough to organize baby stuff for 2 or 3 years and holds a TON of stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Not something we'll pass on to our grandchildren, but feels sturdy enough to organize baby stuff for 2 or 3 years and holds a TON of stuff. Looks just about like the picture, and it is a great storage solution for our small apartment, along with over-the-door organizers. And it's really hard to beat the price. We got six bins so far to go in some of the cubes, and they cost more than the unit itself. But those are optional, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Olson

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I want, I ordered 2 & ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I want, I ordered 2 & i put it together a little diff though ... the rest is on the other side of the closet
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. Love the flexibility and looks of the cubes. When ordering be sure to check the weight of what you are going to store.... some negative reviews seem to be from people who ordered this without thinking about weight. They hold about 10 pounds apiece as described. We liked these cubes so much, we decided to buy more! If you need more than this 6-cube set describes, then do what we did and buy the 16 cube set. It cost as much as two 6-cube sets but you get more cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put in my master bedroom closet for more shelves done the easy way. And let me tell you, these shelves/cube organizers are, for once, FUN TO ASSEMBLE! I actually enjoyed putting them together. I took one star off, because once you put any weight in the compartments, you can't move it without the corner connectors disconnecting and the thing falling apart. So good advice: assemble it at the spot, where you intend it to be, put stuff in the cubes, and done.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We used this for shoes and bags. It was great. He’s basically a Sasquatch and his shoes never fit on typical shoe racks, but these were the perfect size for the look and feel we wanted. I ended up getting more for my own shoes. Super easy to assemble and so far great sturdiness, but we haven’t put anything too heavy on them. The panels are like a fabric almost so I wouldn’t use it for books photos like you would traditional shelving but for our purpose it was great. I had no issues taking it apart and moving the pieces around to get the design we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a couple of days but so far I really like it. Shipping was exact and all of the pieces were included. I was worried that all of my shoes and accessories wouldn’t fit but they do and the cubes look nice. The material is sturdy and meets my needs. It wasn’t hard to put together and it didn’t take too long once I got the hang of how to place the attachments so the cubes would stack the way I wanted them to. I used a 3x3 design instead of 4x4. Hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: ajwanae augustine

customer_reviews.title: They work fantastic and look amazing set up in our room
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for yarn storage. They work fantastic and look amazing set up in our room! I couldn't give it five stars because the picture is very misleading. It looks as if there should be doors included, but there are no doors whatsoever. Setup was not difficult, every piece popped comfortably into place without the need for tools or any kind of help. I've already recommended this to several people, and will recommend it to anyone who needs a great storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice cubes and they are much bigger than I thought they would be. Sturdy enough to put things on top of for a top shelf and very light weight as well. Very easy to assemble and customize. Will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick set up, good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, light, and fits on my closet, wire shelfs. I wanted to have a better open storage system for my closet. The closet has those wire shelving units (open on top for storage, basic bar to hang clothing). This fits with about a quarter inch hang over in front; but now my "non-hanging" clothing isn't just piled on top of the shelves. Set it up (4 across with 2 on top) in about 15 minutes. Good sturdy plastic that is light weight and won't cause more stress to the cheap wire shelving.
customer_reviews.author: ScretSquirrl

customer_reviews.title: Use something sturdy in each cube bottom & secure to wall for safety
customer_reviews.text: At first this was tricky to put together. I realized the plastic round pieces used to connect each panel must face out. All in same direction. I liked that you can customize design of cubes. However, I did not like how 'fragile' & 'flimsy' this was once put together. I was able to provide cube strength by putting backerboard cut to size in the bottom of each cube. This also kept my things from leaning. I would recommend securing this to the wall, especially if using in child's room
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control. Missing/not enough clips
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived earlier than expected, it’s attractive. HOWEVER, it does not come with enough fasteners. This means you end up with loose areas. I thought there was a way to contact the seller but it did not come up as an option here. I purchased it to organize my 5 year old old ‘s coat closet. It’s very cute. Seems sturdy. But again, not worth the purchase if there’s no quality control. Too many of these to choose from to deal with not getting all the parts then wasting your time trying to get the missing pieces sent to you. Mine had 4 clips missing (the black, round, end clips).
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: 5 Starts for sure! The shelving system is great. - very sturdy, well designed and able to be used in a number of different ways and places. -- I use it in my son and daughters closets for clothes as well as toy bins for all their favorite toys. -- Also, there customer service was top notch. I needed additional parts to make a few more toy bins and add to the closet shelving. They were more than willing to help me get the correct parts I needed to help me complete my project. I will defiantly buy more shelving from Langria again!d
customer_reviews.author: Blue02

customer_reviews.title: good for light weight items
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it's easy to assemble and attractive. Cons: (1) Once you put it together it's hard to move the units unless you are very very careful; (2) the bottom pieces of each cube are not flat so that you if you store anything that is not like a flexible piece of clothing it wont lie flat; (3) all the cubes have to be connected in one long wall of cubes. You can't have stand alone columns of cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H Harmon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE. Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I bought them along with those foldable cloth totes to organize my wardrobe, and they are FANTASTIC. They look nice and hold up very well. We moved recently and I found myself buying more of these to store blankets, towels, and body care items since we don’t have much built in storage in this house and they honestly don’t look terrible out in the open if displayed right. I love that they’re so buildable and can be stacked however you like. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: janae

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, but taking it apart is a bit wonky (the connectors cracked once when I realized I had to readjust it). I like the look of it. Bigger than other cubes I’ve had before, but the dimensions were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: minamesephy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to make a home for my daughters Guinea pig. It was super easyvto assemble and feels very sturdy. Will definitely order again when we decide to make a larger home.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these and I love them! I bought the style with doors for my sons toys and the style without doors for organizing my closet. I also have one in my mudroom for organizing shoes. I love these. Easy to assemble and yet so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackee

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why other's were saying its difficult to assemble.. I literally cant stand putting things together, however there are so many youtube tutorials on how to put this together I watched 2 and put it all together with no issues. It's very customizable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cutsie

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my son's bedroom. I originally ordered a different set that's blue and a little larger, but they don't make them anymore so I had to find something else. These are just a little smaller all around but the other set that I received for the same price did not provide very many squares (3). This, if you put a back on the cube, provides 7. I am very happy with these. they are very sturdy compared to my other cubes. I would purchase again 100%.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Side panels split
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Package was damaged. When we tried to assemble found that the plastic side panels were splitting along the wire frame. No problem returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, flimsy, frustrating waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: These dont fit anywhere. Theyre huge. They are horrid to assemble and they fall apart if you even shift them over a few inches. Worst $$ i spent this year (and i buy plenty of duds) save yourself a headache and go get an ikea kallax. Wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly E.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Very easy to assemble, I ordered this to store my bags and shoes , I will definitely be ordering another one .
customer_reviews.author: Katrina B

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: So far I REALLY like this thing. It’s easy to assemble and you can shape it to your space. Our daughter has a lot of blankets and toys and diaper supplies that needed a home in the living room, and my husband and I wanted to maximize our closet shelves that had lots of dead space above them. Just one set worked for all of that. I would recommend. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: JMHP

customer_reviews.title: ... my daughter to have in her dorm room--limited space--works great! Just a little more lightweight than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my daughter to have in her dorm room--limited space--works great! Just a little more lightweight than I expected, so she can't put any heavy things on it, but will do the job nicely
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Seller isn’t responsive
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these months ago and they have held up. Gives my room a boutique feel. I messaged the seller months ago for more clasps, never got back to me. Now i just have extra panels that I haven’t been able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Tash

customer_reviews.title: These were an awesome purchase. They can be made into any style ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after seeing a post on reddit (r/sneakers) about using them to display sneakers and thought i'd give them a try! These were an awesome purchase. They can be made into any style and work wonders for a simple and sharp sneaker display (that the sneaker boxes can actually fit in!!). I will definitely be purchasing more as my collection grows!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pisano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, had it set up in minutes. Not really strong, so I wouldn’t use it for setting heavy items on, especially on the top, but holds cloth bins with all my clothes no problem at all - great way to add a dresser without really adding a hefty piece of furniture. Would be great for a kid’s room also.
customer_reviews.author: MingoFan

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Artistic
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this! This product cannot be made in China! It is so well made. I am not sure where it is from, but I can tell you that I assembled this with a severely injured finger, and I am a petite woman, as well. It is as fun as Legos! I love it! I am not mechanically inclined and it was easy breezy for me to assemble. It is artistic. It is smart. I respect the designer and maker of this product. Thank you for giving me this solution to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa de Ville Uribe

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: We are currently using for a hedgehog cage, plastic seems to be nice and tough. Snapped together easily. Easy to move, and gives him lots of space for little money. And no pesky bars to worry about! Hands down, would buy again! (And for more than my critters)
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: A great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice product for the price. We assembled it in the closet and use it to hold and organize baby clothes. It was also sturdier than I anticipated but I still wouldn't put anything too heavy inside as it appears designed for lighter weight objects such as shoes and clothing. Ultimately, you do get a lot of "storage space" for the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Moran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Attractive Storage Solution!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, really easy to set up and customize to your space, and sturdy. We were able to organize all of our son's toys in the playroom, and he can reach everything. Furthermore, since the units are light, there is no danger of something heavy falling on our young son. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Awful and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: So very easy to put together but I guess like others was missing pieces. I realize though I should have purchase the metal wire one instead of this one because more than 5 pairs of jeans in a cube and it falls apart.....Update: keeps falling apart. Never again. Replacing it with regular shelves that ACTUALLY HOLD something. This is awful
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: It is OK
customer_reviews.text: I did not know the plastic was thin. I does not matter because I am not storing anything heavy. Otherwise it looks good. I also had to buy extra holders for the construction. I do not know why all the holders were not included to put together 6 cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Price-Hobday

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to store my yarn. Light weight, easy to set up. The most difficult part for me was to decide on the configuration :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set-up. Can be split into smaller and modular units as per your needs and space availability. The plastic quality could be better. This is easily breakable, feels like strong polythene sheet than a storage unit, but does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex_143

customer_reviews.title: I am an artist and this displayed my purses with great artistic value
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with your product. I ordered two and because I didn't need a back for my project I had plenty left over.. I am an artist and this displayed my purses with great artistic value. I wouldn't be able to use this system for my clay pieces because they are heavy. Suzanne Parisien Frank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice value recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my solarium outdoors Because it is translucent plastic I have a small plant on each shelf so they get filtered light . I’m not sure sure how long the plastic will remain firm but I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea at Hearts.Global

customer_reviews.title: easily put together
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are just what I was looking for: shelves to store my fabric and help me organize my sewing room. They are perfectly sized, easily put together, and adjustable to fit your space. And at a great price! I will probably purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait... get this now!!! Makes a beautiful show storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhhmazing!!! This is so surprisingly beautiful. So damn sturdy!!!! So stylist!!!! I could go on and on and on. I used for a show rack with 10 cubes and used two for my a printer stand and it's sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product ; bought 4 sets in total ( one with doors ) be prepared to spend money to get extra connectors if you do any configuration other than the basic configuration posted on picture of product
customer_reviews.author: faisal ahmed

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these! I hate organizing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I hate organizing, it is surprising that I'm writing a review for something in that field. However, these were awesome and helped create a fantastic closet system. And if I find that exciting, well, it means it pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Karie

customer_reviews.title: Closet Organizer - great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wife says: Absolutely love these! Fun to assemble and rework based on changing configurations. Gives me peace when going in closet. Organized purses and by color, organized sweaters, and had some leftover for husband's items. I'm my very own Carrie Bradshaw on a budget (1st movie ;))! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Domenico

customer_reviews.title: Not made to put heavy things
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new shelves and they are very easy to assemble I like that you can be creative and assemble them how ever you want and they are sturdy good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Alex bravo

customer_reviews.title: 16 cube
customer_reviews.text: was told by lots of people who have ferrets to get this and it works like a charm. Also works as a shoe rack I love it
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I was missing a package of the connectors and initially was going to return for a refund but I really like the quality of the pannels, so instead I bought an 8 pack for $5.99 rather than lose the money to ship back.. I actually purchased the 16 cube organizer also, but I bought extra connectors ahead of time so I don't run into this problem again. A little disappointing but small error I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Huffy Hedgie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together for useful storage and organization
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with how easily and quickly this came together. Was reorganizing my front coat closet that had so much wasted space. Built it as 3 sets of 2 stacked together, then realized I wanted 4 on one side and 2 on the other to accommodate coats hanging, and it couldn't have been easier to pop one section out and reassemble on the other side. Very happy with the end results.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I need to see my purses so I purchased this. I love it! Easy to assemble. It holds purses and boots great. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: 1stlady

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Deserves to be called more than a shoe rack. Cubes are large and hold lots of yarn. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I love this because it holds plenty and I am also ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to store my yarn in. I love this because it holds plenty and I am also able to see what colors I already have. Plus I can always add onto it if I need too.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this product it is bigger than I thought it would be, I thought the pictures would be misleading but they weren't. I got received enough parts plus more to build this. we are currently using it to house our home makerspace materials, paper, filament, sewing machines, plot cutters things like that. The plastic parts seem to be some sort of acrylic but the are actually a wire frame with a plastic wrapped around it but they are surprisingly strong for the way they are build. long story short would recommend and will be reordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: Corpus Christi Makerspace

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for adjustable cubes organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for adjustable cubes organizer, but can't really hold anything more than 5 lb it seems. After that, it'll fall apart and you'll need to put it back together again.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to provide closet storage for my daughter. I found this a little challenging to build, however seems sturdy once together. My biggest issue was taking pieces apart to reconfigure once they were locked into place. I purchased a few 13” storage bins to use as drawers and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Boo. Cheap. Comes apart all of the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Boo. Cheap. Comes apart all of the time and is unstable. Impossible to move unless you expect everything to land on the floor. I'll just stick to the cubbies next time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These little cubes are amazing. They were easy to assemble and are pretty sturdy. I like that you can build them to your liking. The item arrived timely and in great condition. I'll be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy , fits a lot of my clothes . I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy assembly. Bought a 2nd set!
customer_reviews.text: It came complete with nothing missing. Great to create barriers for my older daschund. I liked it so much I bought a 2nd set for organization!
customer_reviews.author: Azacme

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Langria Modular System in a timely manner. It was very easy putting things together. Instructions are not the best but if you use your common sense you'll get the hang of it. I can't say anything wrong about this product because it worked out perfectly for me. It's durable and can hold a lot of stuff. I would encourage anyone interested in organizing their home to purchase this product. I planning on purchasing the 9 cube and 12 cube soon.
customer_reviews.author: Iamblessed...

customer_reviews.title: but for the price it's an excellent purchase. Holds all my shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wish the plastic was a touch sturdier, but for the price it's an excellent purchase. Holds all my shoes, the rest of it is very sturdy, and it came with extra corner pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to put together and light weight enough yo sit on top of my plastic storage drawers. I am using it to organize my yarn. The sides are clear enough to allow me to see the colors through the sides also. If you are looking for the perfect storage solution, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyLois

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Wish the shelves could hold a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Wish the shelves could hold a little more weight but not that big of a concern - the one with the most just bows a bit. Looks great in my closet under a stair case with 5 high then 4 then 3 and 2 cubes high. Love that its so customizable.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug9097

customer_reviews.title: It’s not easy to assemble like I thought.!
customer_reviews.text: It look sturdy for me.the only thing I hate is putting up together,cause it’s not easy like you think 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Lyn-che

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for sorting storage space. Fairly durable. Smart concept product, but definitely takes time to put together
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for organizating and holding yarn in my office. They are very perfect
customer_reviews.author: D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: This product is Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product is Great Quality.... but i absolutely HATED putting it together. My only advice is , have some vodka handy so you don’t actually remember putting it together!! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: angie hassan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works in my closet, easy to assemble and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Warner

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Used 9 cubes for my self and 6 for my daughters bedroom .my closet looks so much better now ! Def recommend ! Easy to assemble ! My 9yr daughter assembled her 6 cubes :)
customer_reviews.author: rubygarza09

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Nice looking enough to go in a closet ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Nice looking enough to go in a closet or outside as part of the decor, light, sturdy, and an absolute breeze to set up. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: snipeTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't keep it together
customer_reviews.text: It was frustrating to set up and one I did, pieces would become unhinged constantly. I even used a small hammer to make sure everything 'clicked' into place, but to no avail. I am sad that I am not able to return it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I'm going to order more units
customer_reviews.text: I literally put this together in a few minutes and now my closet is well organized. I love it. I'm going to order more units.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.B

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup!
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are great addition to my bathroom. They’re nice and sturdy and hold a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Fin G

customer_reviews.title: Purchased and used as a barrier to keep our bunny ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and used as a barrier to keep our bunny away from our recliners. It looks cleaner than the wire version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light but sturdy. Perfect for the toyroom
customer_reviews.text: Put together in minutes. Light but sturdy. Perfect for the toyroom.
customer_reviews.author: reader234

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I am missing 6 of the black circle connectors for the shelves. I can't review the stability of the product without all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Tai' Turner

customer_reviews.title: assembly pictures not good
customer_reviews.text: instructions say front doors but it did not come with any. not a problem. Just a shock. instructions also "muttled". Need clearer instruction Pictures to help people assemble. Took longer to assemble because when I realized the way the brackets were to go, I had to disassemble two and half tiers. Overall, I love my cubes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was easy for me to assemble (I walk with forearm crutches
customer_reviews.text: This was easy for me to assemble (I walk with forearm crutches, just to give you an idea of how easy this must be to assemble lol). This cleaned up my closet and made everything look neat and organized! =)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sullivan Love

customer_reviews.title: Organized closet!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased! Simple, economical, versatile!
customer_reviews.author: mighty mo

customer_reviews.title: They're not very resistant you can't put a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: They're not very resistant you can't put a lot of clothes or things on it so it just ends up taking space
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Count your panels and connectors
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived 4 panels and 2 connectors short. It’s not 16 cubes. It’s 14 and 1 large open space on top. I left 1 panel off the bottom at the back for access to an electrical plug. I am still able to use the product but it was not as it should have been nor what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rosen

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Good. I hope it's a little stronger. I'm satisfied with the price.
customer_reviews.author: smilestf

customer_reviews.title: It is great for holding all my yarn and craft items
customer_reviews.text: i bought this one to go with the other larger one. It is great for holding all my yarn and craft items!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Costello

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Sturdy, very neutral, and great for toy storage. We purchased frosted plastic bins from Target that fit perfectly in these.
customer_reviews.author: bbmac

customer_reviews.title: Organized Closet Space
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the shelving units on two occasions and I would have given 5 stars but extra black discs are needed and should be included. The shelving has doubled my closet space and makes everything extremely organized. I will probably buy another set and will ask for extra discs. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynn Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just wish they gave a few extra parts for various configurations.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. They’re exactly what I needed to organize my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Brochhausen

customer_reviews.title: These shelves are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect such amazing quality. So easy to assemble with NO TOOLS!!! My office/craft room will be so organized!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these and I love them. I use them for yarn storage.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBFF

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and very easy to put together. If the instructions don't help you, there are some videos on Google that are helpful as well. I honestly might order more. I'd just recommend to be careful if you're moving it around the room and have things inside of the cubes. If not secured, some pieces might come off. But again, super easy to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Use this as fence for my small pet.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Best quality. Love it. Would buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble, they get the job done for cheap. They look alright
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly like you'd expect. It's sturdy enough, kind of hard to pull apart though. It wobbles. The plastic will definitely bend under some weight, but hasn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: These were larger then I anticipated which was a great surprise. Very easy to put together and looks ...
customer_reviews.text: These were larger then I anticipated which was a great surprise. Very easy to put together and looks perfect. Especially for the money I’m more than satisfied
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: easy set up. durable for a few shoes, and some clothes. i don't recommend putting books on any of the upper shelving.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: They sent an incorrect number of panels and connections. If you want there to be a top to your shelf you'll have to precariously stack it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Beheler

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. It arrived on time and was easy to assemble. I bought it to help keep my granddaughter's room clutter free. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MzVal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and seem sturdy enough. We shall see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G

product_meta.title: LANGRIA 6-Cubes Storage Cubes Organizer, DIY Small Animal Cage for Rabbit, Guinea Pigs, Puppy Pet Products Portable Modular Organization System
feature_bullets: AMPLE STORAGE SPACE: each cube sized at 13.8”L x 13.8”W x 13.8”H and with a capacity of 10lbs, this storage organizer has a great capacity, and will keep your shoes, toys and many other daily things neat, clean and save space

MODERN CREATIVE DESIGN:made up of translucent white panels, this shelving unit adds a modern, simple design that can easily match any style no matter where you place it. Cubes can be used separately, or they can be stacked and combined for a greater storage capacity; let your imagination flows and create your unique closet

LONG LASTING ECO-MATERIALS: frames of the cube panels are made of steel to enable the cubes to hold up to 22 lbs.; resistant plastic connectors securely join the panels and avoid wobbles and panels are eco-friendly and chemical-free
HASSLE-FREE ASSEMBLE: multi-angle connectors are easily attachable on the cubes, making the shelving very easy and quick to put together
EASY MAINTENANCE: it’s waterproofed and dust-resistant; panels are easy to clean with a damp cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars443 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
